snippet: The Southern Baptist Convention on Friday reprimanded Richard Land, the president of its policy branch, for insensitive remarks about black leaders and the Trayvon Martin shooting.
abstract: Southern Baptist Convention reprimands Richard Land, the chief of its policy branch, for making racially provocative remarks about the Trayvon Martin killing and announces the cancellation of Land's weekly radio program on public affairs.
lead_paragraph: The Southern Baptist Convention on Friday reprimanded Richard Land, the president of its policy branch, for insensitive remarks about black leaders and the Trayvon Martin shooting.

headline.seo: Southern Baptists Reprimand Spokesman for Insensitive Comments
headline.main: Baptists Reprimand Policy Leader for Comments
